DOC.brief_summary: This study examine long term safety efficacy Fixed Dose combination BAY98-7106 ( nifedipine plus candesartan primarily high dose development ) patient moderate severe hypertension . Patients meet entry criterion , receive Fixed Dose combination 28 week , include 8 week stepwise dose increase high target dose . The first 200 subject complete 28 week continue treatment additional 24 week ( 52 week total ) . Subjects tolerate increase dose treat high tolerable dose .
